title: Kalihgat
creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Terry Melvin and ACMI
brief_description: Terry Melvin recalls a cathartic event from his youth, when he travelled as a university student to India. In Calcutta, he worked in a hospice for the dying and destitute and tells of the experiences that have shaped and haunted the person his is today.
creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Terry Melvin and ACMI
